review: Easy set up and does all that is says

review: Excellent little gadget.  Very happy with it. The bluray player we have doesn't include the amazon app. which is my only disappointment. Otherwise it's very cool.

review: Amazing product, especially if you're a Prime member.  Highly recommended.

review: Installation and operation is exactly as advertised!  Very impressive.

review: Works very good.Easy to use. Been using it for a couple of weeks and only had one glitch. Rebooting took care of the problem.

review: Set up easy.  Worked as advertised.
author: Thomas J. McCulloch "disappointed in tacoma"

review: I really enjoy the Amazon Fire stick,  but will admit it is frustrating that another cable must be plugged into the wall,  unlike Chromecast and it's ability to use the TV USB port as a power source.The apps work well and overall,  I enjoy it. I've had to plug and unplug the device a few times for the display to turn back on.
author: Jason Randall
